item.title: Kimi add a quote by Robertson Davies
item.description: "Authors like cats because they are such quiet, lovable, wise creatures, and cats like authors for the same reasons." -- Robertson Davies

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Eugen Weber
item.description: "If cats could write history, their history would be mostly about cats." -- Eugen Weber

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Jeffery Masson
item.description: "We need cats to need us. It unnerves us that they do not. However, if they do not need us, they nonetheless seem to love us." -- Jeffery Masson

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Francois Joseph Mery
item.description: "God made the cat to give man the pleasure of stroking a tiger." -- Francois Joseph Mery

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Henry N. Beard
item.description:
"<i>From CATS ARE KIND</i>
"A man said to the universe, 'Sir, I exist!' 'Excellent,' replied the universe, 'I've been looking for someone to take care of my cats." -- Henry N. Beard

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Cheris Kramarae
item.description: "Feminism is the radical notion that women are human beings." -- Cheris Kramarae

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Plato
item.description: "If women are expected to do the same work as men, we must teach them the same things." -- Plato

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Jessica Valenti
item.description: "What’s the worst possible thing you can call a woman? Don’t hold back, now. You’re probably thinking of words like slut, whore, bitch, cunt (I told you not to hold back!), skank. Okay, now, what are the worst things you can call a guy? Fag, girl, bitch, pussy. I’ve even heard the term “mangina.” Notice anything? The worst thing you can call a girl is a girl. The worst thing you can call a guy is a girl. Being a woman is the ultimate insult. Now tell me that’s not royally fucked up." -- Jessica Valenti

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Irina Dunn
item.description: "A woman needs a man like a fish needs a bicycle." -- Irina Dunn

item.title: Kimi add a quote by W. Somerset Maugham
item.description: "If a man hasn't what's necessary to make a woman love him, it's his fault, not hers." -- W. Somerset Maugham

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Mary Wollstonecraft
item.description: "Taught from their infancy that beauty is woman's sceptre, the mind shapes itself to the body, and roaming round its gilt cage, only seeks to adorn its prison." -- Mary Wollstonecraft

item.title: Kimi add a quote by Richard G. Scott
item.description: "We become what we want to be by consistently being what we want to become each day." -- Richard G. Scott
